title: It is official
content:
[url=https://gna.org/project/memberlist.php?group=wesnoth]/gna.org/project/memberli...up=wesnoth[/url] : Shadow Master in Wesnoth development group.

I am a developer member in an open-source software project that is quite mature right now. That also made me, automatically, moderator of the project's user forum ([url=http://www.wesnoth.org/forum/index.php]here[/url], 8174 members so far).

This must be my definite bye to the Keen community.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].

title: Re: It is official
content:
Today I got a new cat, in other words I will be very unable to participate to the Keen community for some reason....-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: It is official
content: Wow, congrats SM!  But we all know you never really leave the Keen community - so I'm sure we'll see you from time to time [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] <font color="#EEF2EE">[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]</font>

title: Re: It is official
content:
Congrats for that. But yeah, we'll likely see you around. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] Too bad your mod was never (?) finished, it all looked so good.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: it is official
content: Wow, that looks really sweet.  I'm impressed.  This should be on XBox live arcade.
Congrats, and good luck

title: Re: !!
content:
Goodbye Shadow Master, it was good knowing you online for the short time that I did. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I hope you come back.

title: Re: !!
content:
Good luck, and goodbye if you feel you have to leave.------------------

title: Re: it is official
content:
szevvy: "Wow, that looks really sweet. I'm impressed. This should be on XBox live arcade."

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: it is official
content:
How very wonderful! Keeners are going up in the world. Don't forget us when you're famous, see if you can sneak a Keen reference in somewhere. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: it is official
content:
Hey, cool! I occasionally play that game, let me know what stuff you add(ed) to it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

Hold it. Definite goodbye? But you can still visit every once in a while, see what's going on... right?

Ah well, we'll miss you!____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].
